mapper.select: select a.bill_id, a.cdate, a.money, a.`desc`, a.catalog_id, a.`catalog_name`, a.who, a.district_id, a.district_name, a.img,c.tag_name,c.tag_id,c.tag_type from bus_bill a left join bus_bill_tag b on a.bill_id = b.bill_id left join bas_tag c on c.tag_id = b.tag_id where a.bill_id = #{billId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select a.bill_id, a.money,a.catalog_name ,DATE_FORMAT(a.cdate,'%Y-%m-%d') cdate_format, c.tag_name,c.tag_id,c.tag_type from bus_bill a left join bus_bill_tag b on a.bill_id = b.bill_id left join bas_tag c on c.tag_id = b.tag_id order by a.cdate desc
